sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>FS to adapt to new TPS data model</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[try {
    gs.info('VRM ENHANCING THIRD PARTY SCORE MODEL (Fix Script): START');
    //Checking if this is already executed
    var overallService = new GlideRecord('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_tpss_provider');
    overallService.addQuery('score_type', '8908d8177792011044a7d223dc5a996a');
    overallService.query();
    if (!overallService.next()) {
        //Inserting overall service for any existing single provider services.
        var tpsProviderService = new GlideRecord('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_tpss_provider');
        tpsProviderService.query();
        while (tpsProviderService.next()) {
            overallService.initialize();
            for (prop in tpsProviderService) {
                overallService.setValue(prop, tpsProviderService.getValue(prop));
            }
            overallService.setValue('score_type', '8908d8177792011044a7d223dc5a996a');
            overallService.setValue('risk_area', '');
            overallService.insert();
        }

        //updating the latest scores boolean
        var tpsProviderScore = new GlideAggregate('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_security_score');
        tpsProviderScore.addAggregate('COUNT', 'score');
        tpsProviderScore.groupBy('provider');
        tpsProviderScore.groupBy('vendor');
        tpsProviderScore.query();
        var latestScoreGR = new GlideRecord('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_security_score');
        while (tpsProviderScore.next()) {
            latestScoreGR.initialize();
            latestScoreGR.addQuery('provider', tpsProviderScore.provider);
            latestScoreGR.addQuery('vendor', tpsProviderScore.vendor);
            latestScoreGR.orderByDesc('generated_on');
            latestScoreGR.setLimit(1);
            latestScoreGR.query();
            if (latestScoreGR.next()) {
                latestScoreGR.setValue('is_latest', 'true');
                latestScoreGR.update();
            }
        }

        // // Creating overall risk score for single domain provider scores
        var scoreGr = new GlideRecord('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_security_score');
        scoreGr.addQuery('is_latest', 'true');
        scoreGr.addEncodedQuery('provider.score_provider.is_multi_factorISEMPTY^ORprovider.score_provider.is_multi_factor=false');
        scoreGr.query();
        var overallScoreGr = new GlideRecord('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_security_score');
        var scoreGrProvider = new GlideRecord('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_tpss_provider');
        var overallProvider = new GlideRecord('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_tpss_provider');
        while (scoreGr.next()) {
            scoreGrProvider.initialize();
            scoreGrProvider.addQuery('sys_id', scoreGr.getValue('provider'));
            scoreGrProvider.query();
            if (!scoreGrProvider.next()) continue;
            overallProvider.initialize();
            overallProvider.addQuery('score_provider', scoreGrProvider.getValue('score_provider'));
            overallProvider.addQuery('score_type', '8908d8177792011044a7d223dc5a996a');
            overallProvider.setLimit(1);
            overallProvider.query();
            if (!overallProvider.next()) continue;
            overallScoreGr.initialize();
            for (prop in scoreGr) {
                overallScoreGr.setValue(prop, scoreGr.getValue(prop));
            }
            overallScoreGr.setValue('provider', overallProvider.getUniqueValue());
            overallScoreGr.insert();
        }
    }

    gs.info('VRM ENHANCING THIRD PARTY SCORE MODEL (Fix Script): END');
} catch (e) {
    gs.error('VRM ENHANCING THIRD PARTY SCORE MODEL (Fix Script): ' + e);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-05-12 17:53:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7f02e26bc39f0110f6c95c6ca140ddc7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FS to adapt to new TPS data model</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">4c821a2d9f42220030581471367fcf2c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">4c821a2d9f42220030581471367fcf2c</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_7f02e26bc39f0110f6c95c6ca140ddc7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-13 17:18:29</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>true</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: FS to adapt to new TPS data model
